modName: Helarchen Creek - No Snow Under the Roof
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]For users of Helarchen Creek by [color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Arthmoor[/b][/size][/color] and No Snow Under the Roof by [color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Prometheus[/b][/size][/color][/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/vAghdDN.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=6]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80189]Helarchen Creek
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51188/?]No Snow Under the Roof[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Load Order[/size][/color]
Place "Helarchen Creek - No Snow Under the Roof.esp" AFTER "Helarchen Creek.esp"


If you're a user of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url] you might need this.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62120/?]Cutting Room Floor - No Snow Under the Roof[/url][/center]
author: SkyrimFantom

files.name: Helarchen Creek - No Snow Under the Roof
